channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Taskmaster You See In Thunderbolts* Isnâ€™t Who You Think It Is According To Shocking MCU Movie Theory
item.description: A new MCU theory suggests that the version of Taskmaster we've seen in trailers for Thunderbolts* isn't actually Olga Kurylenko's Antonia Dreykov.

item.title: Everyone Told Me To Prepare Myself For These 10 Emotional Movies, But I Bawled My Eyes Out Anyway
item.description: No matter how ready you think you are for the emotional stories of these movies, nothing will prepare you for how much they'll make you cry.

item.title: "Is That Sexy These Days?" Joseph Quinn Explains How His Version Of Johnny Storm In The Fantastic Four: First Steps Differs From Chris Evans' Take And Other Past Adaptations
item.description: The Fantastic Four: First Steps star Joseph Quinn addresses Johnny Storm's traditional personality and how his Human Torch performance is different.
